stories.title: Show HN: Tunnelrat, A 3D multiplayer game to work your spatial orientation

stories.text:
Hello Everyone,

We (Simplefin) are an early-stage fintech company based out of India. We are building an All-in-One financial OS for micro and small businesses.

Our mission is to empower every small business with efficient software tools so that they can do business with ease.

We are actively looking to hire a full-stack developer to join our core product team.

If you want to know more about Simplefin, openings at Simplefin, and our core values and ethics, please check out this page.

https://simplefin.notion.site/Join-us-Simplefin-e16c159d70674d7881a56595e1485945
